answers.answer: The only part I can help with is that fructose is a sugar and will raise his BG (blood sugars) even more.  Your body converts ALL carbohydrates to BG.  So potato, rice, pasta, banana... will raise his BG. Insulin lowers BG so the two have to match.Do a search on M.U.F.A  Lots of info
You might consider this UK MS Support Group link to locate services near you where you can ask to locate M.U.F.A. formula/s.http://www.mssociety.org.uk/near-me
